response.message:
Congratulations my fellow Super Users!

It's been a great year and let's kick start our second with this awesome contest!

And, courtesy of Ivo and Gnoupi and Sathya, some example "awesome" Super User questions / answers that are exemplars of what the judges might be looking for.

Q: How can I take browser screenshots at a higher resolution than my browser supports?
http://superuser.com/questions/120266/how-can-i-take-browser-screenshots-at-a-higher-resolution-than-my-browser-support

Q: What are the essential tools you always have handy when attempting to fix someone's PC problem?
http://superuser.com/questions/98423/what-are-the-essential-tools-you-always-have-handy-when-attempting-to-fix-someone

Q: Most useful AutoHotkey scripts?
http://superuser.com/questions/7271/most-useful-autohotkey-scripts

A: How to declutter and organize the cables on and under my desk?
http://superuser.com/questions/8483/how-to-declutter-and-organize-the-cables-on-and-under-my-desk/8493#8493

This SEDE query of "most favorited Super User questions"  is also a good place to look

http://odata.stackexchange.com/superuser/q/9432/which-questions-were-favorited-most

Happy birthday, Super User!

May the best 16 win...
Most awesomest prize is the T-Shirt. Now I need to think about a useful meta question...

Happy Birthday! I love this webiste and its sister sites.

Great work and great community.
Nice! And the contest is really a great way of drawing attention to Super User. I like it!
Hope the winners will receive a Platinum-Super-Epic badge!!! Once a year, happy Bday all!
Can we pay for t-shirts if we can't win them?
Wow! This is so encouraging! You guys truly rock hard!

"Contest open to every man, woman, and child on planet Earth, except those men, women, or children living in places where contests like this are somehow illegal. "

You probably should clarify this somewhat.  There're places where running contests are legal but have obnoxious rules in place that make doing so difficult.  eg Quebec insists on being paid 10% of the prize values and requires significant amounts of paperwork.

http://contests.about.com/od/sweepstakes101/f/VoidinQuebec.htm

Contest open to every man, woman, and child on planet Earth, except those men, women, or children living in places where contests like this are somehow illegal — or the relevant contest laws in your jurisdiction are so obnoxious that awarding the prize becomes impractical.


Not to every child. Not to children under 13. :) (No hard feelings Jeff?)
